about_the_game:
IndusTree is our cozy tree building game where you get random tiles and try to place them as best as you can to grow your very own special tree. Meanwhile nature throws various challenges at you like bad weather, pests, climate, diseases, etc.

Try to survive as best as you can by completing objectives, earning new tiles and opening booster packs that may specialize your stack of tiles in a certain direction.



Seperate cards with tree parts let you design your tree just the way you like it!



Positive and negative events mix up the flow and either help or hinder your growth!



Booster packs include different kinds of tiles, so choose wisely.

Features

  • Weather that influences you and your environment!
  • Seasons with fitting atmosphere and challenges!
  • Events that mix up gameplay!
  • Challenges that add a sense of progression and fitting rewards!
  • Relaxing atmosphere and music!
  • Cozy gameplay!
  • Underground exploration!
